enjoyingDialog.title: ENJOYING LANDOVER?

Glad to have you in the Landover community!
Are you enjoying the game?

feedbackDialog.title: Feedback
feedbackDialog.subtitle:
Please let us know how we can improve.
Leave us a comment or suggestion. We’re always improving!
feedbackDialog.thanksMessage: Thank you for the feedback! Our team will investigate asap. We’re always trying to improve Landover!

paragraphs.1: GDPR and The Right to be Forgotten. How can I view or delete my account data?

2.first: You can view all the account data that Landover stores by signing in on the app or website (
2.second: ), and going to your profile and edit info pages.

paragraphs.3: This data consists of personal info that you entered on your settings page, for example, your user IDs, username, and email, as well as mobile device info (stored so we can send notifications to your device), about info, location country and hometown that you voluntarily provided.
paragraphs.4: If you wish to completely delete your account and all data, you can choose to delete your account on the edit info / settings page.
paragraphs.5: Please be aware that deleting your account in this way will permanently remove your data, except for the data that we need to keep to exercise our legal rights or to comply with a legal obligation. For example, if you have been banned from Landover, we keep the minimum necessary information to make sure we enforce our policies and prevent future violations.
paragraphs.6: Please also note that this will not delete your game records, your comments or other public posts.
paragraphs.7: This can not be undone, even by staff, so please think carefully before deleting your account in this way.

8.first: ***If you have lost access to your account, or have any questions about this process, please write to
8.second: and we will be happy to help.

tutorial.webError: Please, download the app to play tutorial.
tutorial.welcome: Welcome to Landover! In this tutorial we’re going to teach you all about Landover and how to play. To better guide you, I’m going to ask a couple questions. <bold>Have you ever played Settlers of Catan?</bold>
tutorial.playALot:
Great! People who have played a lot of Catan will find Landover very similar, especially if you played Cities & Knights. Here are the major differences with Landover:
- Knights replaced with military
- Robber replaced with catapults
- No player trading, but you can trade 3:1 with the bank
tutorial.playALittle:
Don’t worry! Even if you don’t have a lot of experience with Catan, we’ll teach you what you need to know.

Tap to continue
tutorial.firstVillage: Place your village on a high value corner below. They are indicated in red. Try to get one that has 3 different types of resources. It's always good to start with wheat, clay, wood, or sheep.
tutorial.firstCity: Now it’s time to place your city! Cities earn double resources.
tutorial.secondRoad: Congrats! Now one more road! Go ahead and choose which direction you want to build in…
tutorial.moreRoads: You’ve rolled an 8 and earned some wood from your 8 forest tile. Let’s build another road!
tutorial.trading: The Landover bank allows you to trade any resource or commodity 3 for 1. It looks like you can upgrade your village to a city but it requires a trade. Go ahead and try building a city and you should see the Trade to Build prompt. If you want more economical trades, try building a village on a harbor which gives you a 2 for 1 ability.
tutorial.cities: Go ahead and choose a village you'd like to upgrade to a city. It costs 3 ore and 2 wheat but will double the production of your village!
tutorial.barbarians: Barbarians are on their way. The shield top right shows if you are safe or not. If it's red, you need more military. If it's green, then you are safe. Each time they attack you'll lose 1 military power so be sure to keep adding more military over time.
tutorial.metros: Be sure to keep upgrading your culture with your commodity cards. Once you reach level 4 you'll receive a metro worth +2VP. Metros are immune from barbarian attacks and can't be razed by other players.
tutorial.spendResources: You currently are at risk of discarding half your cards if a 7 is rolled! Be sure to spend your resources or build city walls to increase your hand size. City walls cost 2 clay and can be built on any cities.
tutorial.goodLuck: It looks like you are well on your way to 15 VPs. Keep expanding, building villages, upgrading to cities, leveling up your military, and building metros. If you have questions, join us on discord. Try some games against the bots, and when you're ready, challenge your friends!
tutorial.end: You have just reached 15 VPs and have won the game! Hopefully you had some fun along the way. We highly recommend you try a solo game against one bot.

cancel.title: Otkaži pretplatu
cancel.message: Žao nam je što niste zadovoljni svojom pretplatom. Možete li nam molim vas ostaviti povratne informacije u našem Discord kanalu prvo? Uvek se trudimo poboljšati aplikaciju!

discord.title: PRIKLJUČI SE ZAJEDNICI!
discord.msg2: Želite li upoznati druge igrače Landover-a, pronaći igre, saznati o novim funkcijama i direktno razgovarati sa našim timom programera?

itp.message: Izgleda da vam trebaju neke igre. Imamo igrače spremne i čekamo!
itp.footerMessage: Nema pritiska! Samo ćemo vas obavestiti kada je vaš red za potez.
itp.error: Nismo mogli da vas pridružimo izabranoj igri

inLobby.title: LIVE GAME LOBBY

inLobby.bottomMsg2: Molimo vas da napustite ili ponovo pridružite lobiju za igru kako biste bili spremni čim igra počne.

Our staff will investigate the report and act accordingly.

footer.agree: Dodirivanjem dugmeta za prijavljivanje, saglasni ste sa

email.label: Unesite svoj email kako biste se registrovali ili prijavili na Landover

nickname.label: Nadimak
nickname.short: Molimo vas da unesete nadimak sa najmanje 3 karaktera
nickname.profanity: U nadimku je otkrivena uvreda. Pokušajte ponovo.

verify.message: Email za verifikaciju vam je poslat! Molimo vas da proverite svoje sanduče i verifikujete nalog pre nego što se prijavite

auth.enterPassword: Molimo vas da unesete vašu šifru za {}

forms.nicknameShort: Molimo vas da unesete nadimak sa najmanje 3 karaktera
forms.emailInvalid: Molimo vas da unesete validnu email adresu
forms.resetPasswordEmailSentMsg: Molimo vas da proverite svoje sanduče

history.title: ISTORIJA
history.notAvailable: Podaci o starim rezultatima igara nisu dostupni.

guest.title: Upozorenje!
guest.message: Uskoro ćete se odjaviti sa svog gostujućeg naloga. Svi podaci će biti izgubljeni i sve vaše igre će biti poništene. Kako biste to izbegli, prvo se autentičujte sa nekim drugim prijavljivanjem. Nastaviti?

matchmaking.title: НОВА РАНГОВАНА ИГРА

customGame.question: Желите да изаберете своју мапу и подешавања?

matchmaking.dailyDescription:
24 сата да направите свој потез.
Неограничене игре!
matchmaking.liveDescription:
90 секунди да направите свој потез.
1 игра одједном!
matchmaking.gameCreated:
Креирајте нову рангирану дневну игру.
аша игра ће ускоро почети.

help.title: DOBRODOŠLI U LANDOVER!
help.onboardingText: For help, you can always go here to replay the tutorial, read rules and watch videos.

options.title: OPCIJE

name.title: Ime igre (opciono)
name.tooltip: Defaults to map name if left blank.

time.title: Vreme po potezu
time.tooltip: 1 day or more is a daily game. Anything less is a live game.

points.title: Bodovi za pobedu
points.tooltip: How many VPs before the game is over. Defaults to map suggestion.

barbDelay.title: Odgoda barbara
barbDelay.tooltip: Delay barbarian tracker this many barbarian rolls.

immunity.title: Immunity
immunity.tooltip: Protect players from raids until they have more than specified VPs.

options.barbDelayTooltip:
Broj bacanja kocke pre nego što barbari počnu da napreduju
prema napadu.

mapHints.title: Nagoveštaji mape
mapHints.tooltip:
Omogućava indikatore nagoveštaja mape prilikom
izgradnje struktura.

charity.title: Dobrotvorne sedmice
charity.tooltip: Dajte jedan nasumični resurs kada se baci 7

resources.title: Početni resursi
resources.tooltip: Dajte svakom korisniku po jedan resurs svake vrste kada igra počne

raids.title: Napadi
raids.tooltip: Omogućava/Onemogućava trošenje jednog vojnog resursa za napad na protivnika.

fairDice.title: Pravedne kocke
fairDice.tooltip: Zamenjuje pravi slučaj sa ravnomernom raspodelom bacanja kocke.

culture.title: Kultura
culture.tooltip:
Omogućava nadogradnje nauke, politike i trgovine,
 tako da možete prikupljati kartice razvoja
i zarađivati ​​metro stanice.

luckyRaid.title: Srećni 7 napad
luckyRaid.tooltip:
Igraču koji je poslednji na tabeli a baci 7,
se nagrađuje besplatan napad.

map.title: IZABERI MAPU
map.mapTypeMsg: Izaberi tip mape koju želiš kreirati.
map.createAccountMsg: Morate se registrovati kako biste kreirali mape.

confirmDialog.duplicate: Da li ste sigurni da želite duplicirati ovu mapu?
confirmDialog.makeOfficial: Da li ste sigurni da želite ozvaničiti ovu mapu?
confirmDialog.deleteFromOfficial: Da li ste sigurni da želite izbrisati ovu mapu iz zvaničnih mapa?

playTutorial.title: Igraj tutorijal
playTutorial.message: Kao novi igrač u Landover-u, morate završiti jednu solo igru protiv botova pre nego što se pridružite javnoj igri. Isprobajte tutorijal!

createGame.mapErrorMessage:
Ranked games are only available on Landover standard maps.
Please go back and select an appropriate map

join.title: Pridruži se igrama
join.gameNotAvailable: Ova igra nije dostupna, pokušajte s drugom

leave.title: Napusti Igru
leave.message: Da li ste sigurni da želite napustiti ovu igru?

boot.title: Da li ste sigurni da želite izbaciti

ranked.title: Pridružen!
ranked.message: Pridružili ste se dnevnoj igri! Bićete obavešteni kada igra počne.

recent.title: POZIVANJE IGRAČA
recent.notificationTurnedOf: Ovaj igrač je isključio pozive od skorašnjih igrača. Ovaj igrač će biti uklonjen sa vaše liste.

lobby.alreadyInQueue: Već ste u redu, bićete obavešteni kada igra počne.
lobby.hostToAdd: Morate biti domaćin da biste dodali bota
lobby.waitingForLot: Već čekate da puno igara počne. Obavestićemo vas kada dođe vaš red za potez.
lobby.kickedMsg: Domaćin vas je izbacio iz ove igre. Pokušajte se pridružiti drugoj igri.
lobby.timeOutMsg: Any time a live game starts we ask all players to ready up to ensure everyone is here. Please be sure to stay on the live game lobby screen while waiting for a game. Failing to ready up multiple times will result in a temporary ban from live play.

create.title: KREIRAJ MAPU!
create.firstMap:
Želiš li kreirati svoju prvu prilagođenu mapu?
Koristi map builder da dizajniraš svoj sopstveni svet!
create.randomNumber: Sve pločice bez brojeva biće nasumično dodeljene brojeve svake igre
create.mysteryTiles: Mistična pločica koja se ne može postaviti inicijalno i otkriva se tek kada je igrač istraži
create.randomResources: Nasumično dodeljeni resursi na početku igre

terrain.nonPlacement: Pločica za koju nije dozvoljeno postavljanje
terrain.nonPlacementHint: Izaberite zemljišne pločice na kojima nije dozvoljeno postavljanje naselja.

unsaved.title: Nespašene promene
unsaved.message: Imate nespašene promene na ovoj mapi?

deleteOfficial.title: Izbriši Akciju
deleteOfficial.message: Zvanične mape se ne mogu izbrisati.

delete.title: Izbriši
delete.message: Da li ste sigurni da želite izbrisati ovu mapu?

notifications.title: Ne propustite svoj potez!
notifications.enableText: Omogućite obaveštenja i nikada ne propustite svoj potez. Podsetićemo vas kada je vreme da se vratite kako biste nastavili igru!

ask.title: Da li ste sigurni?
ask.message: Da li ste sigurni da želite odjaviti od e-pošte sa ažuriranjima igre?

unsubscribed.title: Odjavljeni ste
unsubscribed.message: Uspešno ste se odjavili. Možete ponovo uključiti e-poštanska obaveštenja o ažuriranjima igre u postavkama.

showcase.showHex: Each tile represents a different <bold>resource</bold> type:
showcase.showNumbers:
When the number on the tile is rolled anyone with a settlement on that tile collects resource cards. The chart below shows which numbers are best!
<bold><xs>2</xs> <s>3</s> <m>4</m> <l>5</l> <xl>6</xl> <xl>8</xl> <l>9</l> <m>10</m> <s>11</s> <xs>12</xs></bold>
showcase.showVillageCorner: This <bold>6</bold>,<bold>8</bold>,<bold>10</bold> spot is great and gives you wood, wheat and sheep! <bold>Let’s place your first village!</bold>
showcase.showVillageRoad:
Great! Now any time an <bold>8</bold>, <bold>6</bold> or <bold>10</bold> is rolled you’ll get some resources!

Now place a road towards that <bold>9</bold> clay tile…
showcase.showDices: Woohoo! Your empire has started. Let’s roll the dice and collect some resources!
showcase.showResources:
All villages and cities must be separated by 2 roads.
Tap your resource cards below to see how much everything costs.
showcase.showDoneButton: That’s enough building for now. Go ahead and end your turn with the Done button.
showcase.resources2:
They can be used to build different structures like <bold>roads, villages and cities</bold>.
Any time you can build, Landover will suggest those options to you on the map.
showcase.showMilitaryLevel:
This is your <bold>military level</bold>, it's currently 0.
You can level up your military by spending <bold>1 Wheat</bold> and <bold>1 Sheep</bold>.
showcase.showMilitaryIcon:
Military defends against <bold>barbarian attacks</bold> and can be used to <bold>raid</bold> other players.

Let’s upgrade your military level!
showcase.showBarbarianTracker1: This is the barbarian tracker. Each time a <bold>barbarian (skull)</bold> is rolled on the <bold>dice</bold>, the barbarians move one step closer to attacking.
showcase.showBarbarianTracker2: You'll need to level up your military to avoid <bold>losing a city</bold>.
showcase.showCultures1: These 3 circles represent your culture levels for <bold>Science</bold> (green), <bold>Commerce</bold> (yellow), and <bold>Politics</bold> (blue).
showcase.showCultures2:
Leveling up your culture will give you <bold>development cards</bold>. Getting to level 3 unlocks a <bold>special ability</bold>. And get to level 4 first to earn a metro worth <bold>2 VPs</bold>.

Let’s improve your Commerce culture level!
showcase.showPlayers1:
These are the player bars.
They show an overview of every players cards and levels.
showcase.showPlayers2: The top row from left to right is: <bold>Number of ports</bold> (players with 3 or more ports can claim Port Authority for <bold>2 VPs</bold>), <bold>longest route length</bold> (players with the longest route get <bold>2 VPs</bold>), and <bold>Victory Points</bold>.
showcase.showPlayers3:
The next row shows number of <bold>resource/commodity cards</bold>, number of <bold>dev cards</bold>, followed by their <bold>military</bold> and <bold>culture</bold> levels.
You can tap on a player tile to see more info!
showcase.showAnotherVillageCorner: You now have enough resources to build a village and there is an open spot waiting for you. Go ahead and build another village to expand your empire and collect more resources each turn.
showcase.showVP: The objective of Landover is to achieve Victory Points by building settlements and expanding your empire.
